answers.answer: It's going to be okay just pray about it and relax your mind easier said then done I know but stress can harm you and the baby everything will be fine just keep up the good work =-)

Stress can raise ur blood pressure so TRY to relax. :) im sure your baby is fine. Its normal to worry youre a mama now. Your worries wont end until theyre adults, but actually youll still worry lol :) take it easy hun.

question: I'm constantly worried and stressing about my pregnancy to the point where I'm losing sleep my head hurts sooo bad it be pounding my eyes are killing me of how tired they are I feel sooo exhausted mentally and physically i want my baby so bad I'm scare for anything bad to happen to her I try to be positive but it's so hard I'm having high blood pressure problems I'm scare of getting preeclampsia I jus can't wait to have her!! Im too stressed out I also been trying to eat healthy but it's hard I'm alwaysss hungry !! Ughhh
